question: What significant historical status was granted to Jihlava, Czech Republic in 1982?
true_answer: It was declared an urban monument reservation.
asked_question_translated: ¿Qué importante estatus histórico se concedió a Jihlava (República Checa) en 1982?
answer: En 1982, se designó el centro histórico de Jihlava como área de conservación de monumentos urbanos.
answer_translated_eng: In 1982, the historic centre of Jihlava was designated as an urban monument conservation area.
